Name: The Line
About the game: The Line is a unique experiment in the field of 3D puzzles. You control the ball and have to collect all targets on the level to complete it. Sounds easy? Yeah, but the trick is that your every movement leaves a trail behind you. If you touch it you lose. You have to jump, dash and control your speed to find a perfect path that will let you finish the level. But one mistake and you'll start from the beginning. Think, analyze and be quick then you'll succeed. Unique gameplay 30 levels with brain blowing puzzles Each level can be solved in dozens ways Use interactive environment to solve puzzles Fancy graphics with neon style Nice sfx and energetic music Keep track of your game stats Regular updates with new levels Test your logic and savvy with this unusual puzzle game! Good luck!
